sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content: The Text.WhatColorBack function is used to determine the current text background color. The alternate spelling is whatcolourback.
sections.text_content: The Text.WhatColorBack function is used to determine the current text background color. The alternate spelling is whatcolourback.
sections.mdown_content: The **Text.WhatColorBack** function is used to** **determine the current text background color. The alternate spelling is **whatcolourback**.

sections.title: Example
code:
View.Set ("screen")
        Â…
        put "The background of this writing"
        put  "is in color number ", Text.WhatColorBack
sections.raw_content: This program outputs the currently-active background color number. The background color of the message is determined by this number.
sections.text_content: This program outputs the currently-active background color number. The background color of the message is determined by this number.
sections.mdown_content: This program outputs the currently-active background color number. The background color of the message is determined by this number.

sections.title: Details
sections.raw_content: The screen should be in a "screen" or "graphics" mode. Beware that the meaning of background color is different in these two modes. See Text.ColorBack for details.
sections.text_content: The screen should be in a "screen" or "graphics" mode. Beware that the meaning of background color is different in these two modes. See Text.ColorBack for details.
sections.mdown_content: The screen should be in a "*screen*" or* *"*graphics*" mode. Beware that the meaning of background color is different in these two modes. See **Text.ColorBack **for details.

sections.title: Status
sections.raw_content:
Exported qualified.

This means that you can only call the function by calling Text.WhatColorBack, not by calling WhatColorBack.
sections.text_content:
Exported qualified.
This means that you can only call the function by calling Text.WhatColorBack, not by calling WhatColorBack.
sections.mdown_content:
Exported qualified.
This means that you can only call the function by calling **Text.WhatColorBack**, not by calling **WhatColorBack**.
